mosinstall.description:
Welcome to EZ Autos - a simple Automotive sales listing component big on features and configurable options for Mambo powered sites.

Now that installation is complete - it's time to set up the configuration area, specify your vehicle categories, define the secondary categorization parameters for the search/select lists and enter your vehicle listing details

Enjoy your new software!
